Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Ever eaten veggies picked fresh in the
morning? They don't get more delicious
than that, I tell you!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>If you want more of my pumpkins, you'll
find them at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff> in the
center of the village.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Our village's veggies get plenty of sun.
That's what makes them so good!
Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Be right there! Hang on juuust a sec!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You gave me a jump there! <sp:5:0:0>It's not right,
going around scaring folks.<sp:0:4:0>Usually the wife would've seen you come
in, <sp:5:0:0>but I guess Nikki is still chatting away
at the kitchen.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I tell you, there's no rest for a farmer.
Even at dusk, I gotta make my rounds
and check on the veggies.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Now that word of the new kind of veggie
we developed is getting out, Hateno's
produce is getting pretty famous!<sp:0:4:0>Now when someone comes to the village,
it's a toss-up whether they're here for the
<clr:0000>veggies<clr:ffff> or for <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>'s gaudy clothes.<sp:0:4:0>Say, friend...which of those do you think
will attract more people from here out?
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What, again? <sp:5:0:0>Didn't I tell you this just
isn't right? Sheesh.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I thought you might've been a ghost...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Nice bit of rain, eh? I bet the veggies are
grateful down there.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>This'll be the last of today's work in the
field. Tomorrow's another day of looking
after my veggies!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Sky's dark... If that Mr. Sun doesn't
come out, the veggies are gonna sulk.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Before, folks came to Hateno Village for
the <clr:0000>veggies<clr:ffff>, but now they show up for
that gaudy getup <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>makes.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You came to town for...veggies, right?
A straight arrow. I like that.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Whether it's for <clr:0000>veggies <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>, I'm glad
people still make the trip out here.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Ahh, makes sense. I guess she is a world-
famous "designer" or whatever.<sp:0:4:0>Go up the slope farther into the village.
Cece's shop is the <clr:0000>tacky <clr:ffff>one on the <clr:0000>left<clr:ffff>
as you enter the gates.
System_01:
The farmers have been lavishing these
veggies with great care. You probably
shouldn't just take one.
Talk_30: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, are you going to water those for me?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm pleased to see a boy your age show
an interest in farming. Hey, if you're
looking for part-time work... <sp:5:1:0>Just kidding.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a nice thought, but it's raining right
now. You don't want to overwater crops.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But thanks for sparing some time to look
after my veggies.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Unconscious>Come on! I told you those aren't ready to
be harvested! The shop sells full-grown
ones, so go pester them instead.<sp:0:4:0>That's the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff> I'm talking about,
just to the right of the village entrance.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You came to town for...Cece, right?
One of them "fashion" chasers?
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You came to town for... I don't rightly
recall, actually. What a mysterious kid.
near_04: I put in a good day's work.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Ahhh, that's what I thought! Hateno is its
veggies, after all.<sp:0:4:0>I focus on growing pumpkins myself,
but there's other fields and a couple of
<clr:0000>farms<clr:ffff> up the hill too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>And I s'pose nowadays we've got those
weird sculptures to gawk at too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Point is, there's plenty to check out
around our village if you take the time
to look.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you're not here for neither of those,
then...maybe you want Hateno's famous
<clr:0000>dye shop by the bridge<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Oh, but some folks come around looking
for the <clr:0000>research lab<clr:ffff> way atop the hill to
the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> too.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Except I think that guy Robbie who used
to be there said he was off on some
important mission.<sp:0:4:0>I think maybe he went to that new
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing <clr:ffff>they built in front
of Hyrule Castle?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>Anyway, what you see here is me trying
to come up with a new kind of veggie,
but I haven't had much luck so far.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Still, if I quit so soon, I'd be a poor excuse
for a farmer, wouldn't I now?
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseL_00>Hey! Hey! <sp:5:0:0>Those aren't ready for the
harvest yet!<sp:0:4:0>If you want pumpkins, you can buy them
like everyone else. They sell them at the
<clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff> by the village entrance.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:TalkPositive_00>*sigh* Even my wife, Nikki, is gaga about
her stuff.<sp:0:4:0>You see this hat I'm wearing? <sp:5:0:0>Nikki's the
one who insisted I keep it on.<sp:0:4:0>Give me a light, tough, straw hat when it
comes to working the fields any day.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Oh, but don't let the wife hear I said so!<sp:5:0:0>
She, uh, thinks it looks good on me.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh. I was sure you were <clr:0000>Mayor Reede<clr:ffff>
coming to talk for a bit.<sp:0:4:0>Did all this "fashion" business bring you
to town too?<sp:0:4:0>Before, folks came to Hateno Village for
the <clr:0000>veggies<clr:ffff>, but now they show up for
that gaudy getup <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>makes.<sp:0:4:0>So which are you after?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Maaan, thanks to you, I can stop worrying
and get back to work!<sp:0:4:0>The village mayor was getting himself
worked up because the younger folk
didn't care as much about farming.<sp:0:4:0>But so long as we got our <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
the future looks bright!
